sqlMap.select: select t.product_id,t.PRODUCT_NO from PRODUCTMAIN t where t.PRODUCT_NO=#name#
select * from product_certificate t where t.product_id = #productId:DECIMAL# order by file_type
select * from productmain
select ct.CORPORATE_NAME from suppliers_info si inner join commercial_tenant_basic_info ct on ct.N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID=si.merchant_id where to_char(si.supplier_id)=#shopCode:VARCHAR#
select CATEGORY_NAME from CATEGORYS where CATEGORY_ID=#categoryId:DECIMAL#
select BRAND_ID,BRAND_NAME from PROD_BRAND where BRAND_ID = #brandId#
sqlMap.insert:
select seq_app_productmain.nextval from dual
insert into productmain (PRODUCT_ID, CATEGORY_ID, PRODUCT_SUBTITLE, PROCUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC, PACK_LISTING, PRODUCT_TITLE, KEYWORD , STATUS, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, ARCHIVE_TIME, CHECK_TIME, MODIF_TIME, SHOP_CODE, MODIF_USER, UP_TIME, MARKET_PRICE, COST_PRICE, introduce, PRODUCT_NO, CREATE_USER_NAME, BRAND_ID, BRAND_NAME, APPROVAL_TYPE, APPROVAL_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, DRUG_CATE_ID, DRUG_CATE_CODE, ERP_PRODUCT_CODE, INTRODUCE_LAZY) values(#id#, #categoryId#, #productSubtitle#, #name#, #productDesc#, #packListing#, #productTitle#, #keyword#, #status#, #createUser#, #createTime#, #archiveTime#, #checkTime#, #modifTime#, #shopCode#, #modifUser#, #upTime#, #marketPrice#, #costPrice#, #introduce#, (substr((select t.category_code from Categorys t where t.Category_Id = #categoryId:DECIMAL#), 0, 2) || SEQ_APP_PRODUCT_CODE.Nextval), #createUserName#, #brandId#, #brandName#, #approvalType#, #approvalNo#, #categoryName#, #drugCateId#, #drugCateCode#, #erpProductCode#, #introduceLazy#)
sqlMap.select: select PRODUCT_ID,PROCUCT_NAME,STATUS,BRAND_ID,DRUG_CATE_ID,PRODUCT_SUBTITLE,POSTIL,PRODUCT_TYPE,CATEGORY_ID from PRODUCTMAIN where PRODUCT_ID = #id:DECIMAL#
select PRODUCT_SKU_ID,PRODUCT_SKU_CODE,PRODUCT_ID,PRICE,UNIT_WEIGHT,MARK_PRICE,PV_VALUE from PRODUCT_SKU where PRODUCT_ID = #value# and STATUS = '1'

select ps.PRODUCT_SKU_ID productSkuId,ps.PRODUCT_SKU_CODE productSkuCode,ps.PRODUCT_ID productId,ps.PRICE price,ps.COST_PRICE costPrice,ps.UNIT_WEIGHT unitWeight,ps.MARK_PRICE markPrice,PV_VALUE pvValue,SKU_BAR_CODE skuBarCode,COST_INCOME_RATIO costIncomeRatio,ta_temp.col as skuAttrs from product_sku ps left join (select temp.product_sku_id, wm_concat(temp.CATEGORY_ATTR_VALUE) col from (select ps1.product_sku_id,decode(psa.new_attr,null,cav.CATEGORY_ATTR_VALUE,psa.new_attr) as CATEGORY_ATTR_VALUE from product_sku ps1 left join product_sku_attr psa on psa.product_sku_id = ps1.product_sku_id left join category_attr_value cav on cav.CATEGORY_ATTR_ID = psa.CATEGORY_ATTR_ID and psa.CATEGORY_ATTR_VALUE_ID=cav.CATEGORY_ATTR_VALUE_ID) temp group by temp.product_sku_id) ta_temp on ps.product_sku_id=ta_temp.product_sku_id where ps.PRODUCT_ID = #value#
select * from PRODUCT_IMAGE where SKU_ID = #value#
select count(PRODUCT_ID) from PRODUCTMAIN

select count(1) from (select pm.PRODUCT_ID, pm.CATEGORY_ID, pm.PROCUCT_NAME, pm.PRODUCT_DESC, pm.PACK_LISTING, pm.PRODUCT_TITLE, pm.PRODUCT_SUBTITLE, pm.POSTIL, pm.PRODUCT_TYPE, pm.KEYWORD, pm.STATUS, pm.CREATE_USER, pm.CREATE_USER_NAME, pm.CREATE_TIME, pm.PRODUCTHOT, pm.ARCHIVE_TIME, pm.CHECK_USER, pm.CHECK_USER_NAME, pm.CHECK_TIME, MODIF_TIME, pm.SHOP_CODE, pm.MODIF_USER, pm.UP_TIME, pm.MARKET_PRICE, pm.COST_PRICE, pm.PRODUCT_NO, pm.BRAND_ID, pm.BRAND_NAME, pm.APPROVAL_TYPE, pm.APPROVAL_NO, pm.CATEGORY_NAME, pm.DRUG_CATE_ID, pm.DRUG_CATE_CODE, pm.ERP_PRODUCT_CODE from productmain pm where (pm.status = 3 or pm.status = 4 or pm.status = -2)) where PRODUCT_ID in (select ps.product_id from product_sku ps where ps.product_id = PRODUCT_ID and ps.pv_value > 0)
and CATEGORY_ID in (select CATEGORY_ID from CATEGORYS where PARENT_ID = #mCategoryId# )
and CATEGORY_ID in (select sc.CATEGORY_ID from categorys sc inner join categorys mc on sc.parent_id=mc.category_id inner join categorys bc on mc.parent_id=bc.category_id where bc.category_id = #bCategoryId# )
and BRAND_ID in (select BRAND_ID from PROD_BRAND where BRAND_NAME like '%'||#searchBrandName#||'%' )
and shop_code in (select to_char(a.supplier_id) from suppliers_info a,commercial_tenant_basic_info b where a.merchant_id=b.n_commercial_tenant_id and b.corporate_name like '%'||#supplierNameForSearch#||'%')
and CATEGORY_ID in (select CATEGORY_ID from CATEGORYS where CATEGORY_NAME like '%'||#searchCategoryName#||'%' and IS_PHY = 1 )
and CATEGORY_ID in (select distinct(sc.CATEGORY_ID) from categorys sc inner join categorys mc on sc.parent_id=mc.category_id and mc.category_name like '%'||#mCategoryName#||'%' and mc.is_phy=1 )
and CATEGORY_ID in (select distinct(sc.CATEGORY_ID) from categorys sc inner join categorys mc on sc.parent_id=mc.category_id inner join categorys bc on mc.parent_id=bc.category_id and bc.category_name like '%'||#bCategoryName#||'%' and mc.is_phy=1 )

select count(PRODUCT_ID) from PRODUCTMAIN where 1=1
and CATEGORY_ID in (select CATEGORY_ID from CATEGORYS where PARENT_ID = #mCategoryId# )
and CATEGORY_ID in (select sc.CATEGORY_ID from categorys sc inner join categorys mc on sc.parent_id=mc.category_id inner join categorys bc on mc.parent_id=bc.category_id where bc.category_id = #bCategoryId# )
and BRAND_ID in (select BRAND_ID from PROD_BRAND where BRAND_NAME like '%'||#searchBrandName#||'%' )
and shop_code in (select to_char(a.supplier_id) from suppliers_info a,commercial_tenant_basic_info b where a.merchant_id=b.n_commercial_tenant_id and b.corporate_name like '%'||#supplierNameForSearch#||'%')
and CATEGORY_ID in (select CATEGORY_ID from CATEGORYS where CATEGORY_NAME like '%'||#searchCategoryName#||'%' and IS_PHY = 1 )
and CATEGORY_ID in (select distinct(sc.CATEGORY_ID) from categorys sc inner join categorys mc on sc.parent_id=mc.category_id and mc.category_name like '%'||#mCategoryName#||'%' and mc.is_phy=1 )
and CATEGORY_ID in (select distinct(sc.CATEGORY_ID) from categorys sc inner join categorys mc on sc.parent_id=mc.category_id inner join categorys bc on mc.parent_id=bc.category_id and bc.category_name like '%'||#bCategoryName#||'%' and mc.is_phy=1 )

select count(ps.product_sku_id) from product_sku ps inner join productmain p on ps.product_id=p.product_id inner join prod_brand pb on p.brand_id = pb.brand_id inner join categorys ca on p.category_id = ca.category_id inner join categorys mca on mca.category_id = ca.PARENT_ID inner join categorys bca on bca.category_id = mca.PARENT_ID inner join (select temp.product_sku_id, wm_concat(temp.CATEGORY_ATTR_VALUE) col from (select ps1.product_sku_id,decode(psa.new_attr,null,cav.CATEGORY_ATTR_VALUE,psa.new_attr) as CATEGORY_ATTR_VALUE from product_sku ps1 left join product_sku_attr psa on psa.product_sku_id = ps1.product_sku_id left join category_attr_value cav on cav.CATEGORY_ATTR_ID = psa.CATEGORY_ATTR_ID and psa.CATEGORY_ATTR_VALUE_ID=cav.CATEGORY_ATTR_VALUE_ID) temp group by temp.product_sku_id) ta_temp on ps.product_sku_id=ta_temp.product_sku_id where 1=1
and mca.CATEGORY_ID = #mCategoryId#
and bca.CATEGORY_ID = #bCategoryId#
and pb.BRAND_NAME like '%'||#searchBrandName#||'%'
and ca.CATEGORY_NAME like '%'||#searchCategoryName#||'%' and ca.IS_PHY = 1
and mca.category_name like '%'||#mCategoryName#||'%' and mca.is_phy=1
and bca.category_name like '%'||#bCategoryName#||'%' and bca.is_phy=1
select count(PRODUCT_ID) from view_productsku_sections where 1=1
select count(PRODUCT_ID) from PRODUCTMAIN where PROCUCT_NAME = #productName:VARCHAR#

select PRODUCT_ID, CATEGORY_ID, PROCUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC, PACK_LISTING, PRODUCT_TITLE,PRODUCT_SUBTITLE, POSTIL, PRODUCT_TYPE, KEYWORD, STATUS, CREATE_USER,CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_TIME, PRODUCTHOT, ARCHIVE_TIME,CHECK_USER,CHECK_USER_NAME, CHECK_TIME, MODIF_TIME, SHOP_CODE, MODIF_USER, UP_TIME, MARKET_PRICE, COST_PRICE, PRODUCT_NO, BRAND_ID, BRAND_NAME,APPROVAL_TYPE,APPROVAL_NO,CATEGORY_NAME,DRUG_CATE_ID,DRUG_CATE_CODE,ERP_PRODUCT_CODE from PRODUCTMAIN
order by $orderByClause$

select PRODUCT_ID, CATEGORY_ID, PROCUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC, PACK_LISTING, PRODUCT_TITLE,PRODUCT_SUBTITLE,POSTIL, PRODUCT_TYPE, KEYWORD, STATUS, CREATE_USER,CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_TIME, PRODUCTHOT, ARCHIVE_TIME,CHECK_USER,CHECK_USER_NAME, CHECK_TIME, MODIF_TIME, SHOP_CODE, MODIF_USER, UP_TIME, MARKET_PRICE, COST_PRICE, PRODUCT_NO, BRAND_ID, BRAND_NAME,APPROVAL_TYPE,APPROVAL_NO,CATEGORY_NAME,DRUG_CATE_ID,DRUG_CATE_CODE,ERP_PRODUCT_CODE from PRODUCTMAIN where 1=1
and CATEGORY_ID in (select CATEGORY_ID from CATEGORYS where PARENT_ID = #mCategoryId# )
and CATEGORY_ID in (select sc.CATEGORY_ID from categorys sc inner join categorys mc on sc.parent_id=mc.category_id inner join categorys bc on mc.parent_id=bc.category_id where bc.category_id = #bCategoryId# )
and BRAND_ID in (select BRAND_ID from PROD_BRAND where BRAND_NAME like '%'||#searchBrandName#||'%' )
and shop_code in (select to_char(a.supplier_id) from suppliers_info a,commercial_tenant_basic_info b where a.merchant_id=b.n_commercial_tenant_id and b.corporate_name like '%'||#supplierNameForSearch#||'%')
and CATEGORY_ID in (select CATEGORY_ID from CATEGORYS where CATEGORY_NAME like '%'||#searchCategoryName#||'%' and IS_PHY = 1 )
and CATEGORY_ID in (select distinct(sc.CATEGORY_ID) from categorys sc inner join categorys mc on sc.parent_id=mc.category_id and mc.category_name like '%'||#mCategoryName#||'%' and mc.is_phy=1 )
and CATEGORY_ID in (select distinct(sc.CATEGORY_ID) from categorys sc inner join categorys mc on sc.parent_id=mc.category_id inner join categorys bc on mc.parent_id=bc.category_id and bc.category_name like '%'||#bCategoryName#||'%' and mc.is_phy=1 )
order by $orderByClause$

select PRODUCT_ID, CATEGORY_ID, PROCUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC, PACK_LISTING, PRODUCT_TITLE,PRODUCT_SUBTITLE,POSTIL, PRODUCT_TYPE, KEYWORD, STATUS, CREATE_USER,CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_TIME, PRODUCTHOT, ARCHIVE_TIME,CHECK_USER,CHECK_USER_NAME, CHECK_TIME, MODIF_TIME, SHOP_CODE, MODIF_USER, UP_TIME, MARKET_PRICE, COST_PRICE, PRODUCT_NO, BRAND_ID, BRAND_NAME,APPROVAL_TYPE,APPROVAL_NO,CATEGORY_NAME,DRUG_CATE_ID,DRUG_CATE_CODE,ERP_PRODUCT_CODE from PRODUCTMAIN where 1=1
and CATEGORY_ID in (select CATEGORY_ID from CATEGORYS where PARENT_ID = #mCategoryId# )
and CATEGORY_ID in (select sc.CATEGORY_ID from categorys sc inner join categorys mc on sc.parent_id=mc.category_id inner join categorys bc on mc.parent_id=bc.category_id where bc.category_id = #bCategoryId# )
and BRAND_ID in (select BRAND_ID from PROD_BRAND where BRAND_NAME like '%'||#searchBrandName#||'%' )
and CATEGORY_ID in (select CATEGORY_ID from CATEGORYS where CATEGORY_NAME like '%'||#searchCategoryName#||'%' and IS_PHY = 1 )
and CATEGORY_ID in (select distinct(sc.CATEGORY_ID) from categorys sc inner join categorys mc on sc.parent_id=mc.category_id and mc.category_name like '%'||#mCategoryName#||'%' and mc.is_phy=1 )
and CATEGORY_ID in (select distinct(sc.CATEGORY_ID) from categorys sc inner join categorys mc on sc.parent_id=mc.category_id inner join categorys bc on mc.parent_id=bc.category_id and bc.category_name like '%'||#bCategoryName#||'%' and mc.is_phy=1 )
order by $orderByClause$

select * from (select pm.PRODUCT_ID, pm.CATEGORY_ID, pm.PROCUCT_NAME, pm.PRODUCT_DESC, pm.PACK_LISTING, pm.PRODUCT_TITLE, pm.PRODUCT_SUBTITLE, pm.POSTIL, pm.PRODUCT_TYPE, pm.KEYWORD, pm.STATUS, pm.CREATE_USER, pm.CREATE_USER_NAME, pm.CREATE_TIME, pm.PRODUCTHOT, pm.ARCHIVE_TIME, pm.CHECK_USER, pm.CHECK_USER_NAME, pm.CHECK_TIME, MODIF_TIME, pm.SHOP_CODE, pm.MODIF_USER, pm.UP_TIME, pm.MARKET_PRICE, pm.COST_PRICE, pm.PRODUCT_NO, pm.BRAND_ID, pm.BRAND_NAME, pm.APPROVAL_TYPE, pm.APPROVAL_NO, pm.CATEGORY_NAME, pm.DRUG_CATE_ID, pm.DRUG_CATE_CODE, pm.ERP_PRODUCT_CODE from productmain pm where (pm.status = 3 or pm.status = 4 or pm.status = -2)) where PRODUCT_ID in (select ps.product_id from product_sku ps where ps.product_id = PRODUCT_ID and ps.pv_value > 0)
and CATEGORY_ID in (select CATEGORY_ID from CATEGORYS where PARENT_ID = #mCategoryId# )
and CATEGORY_ID in (select sc.CATEGORY_ID from categorys sc inner join categorys mc on sc.parent_id=mc.category_id inner join categorys bc on mc.parent_id=bc.category_id where bc.category_id = #bCategoryId# )
and BRAND_ID in (select BRAND_ID from PROD_BRAND where BRAND_NAME like '%'||#searchBrandName#||'%' )
and CATEGORY_ID in (select CATEGORY_ID from CATEGORYS where CATEGORY_NAME like '%'||#searchCategoryName#||'%' and IS_PHY = 1 )
and CATEGORY_ID in (select distinct(sc.CATEGORY_ID) from categorys sc inner join categorys mc on sc.parent_id=mc.category_id and mc.category_name like '%'||#mCategoryName#||'%' and mc.is_phy=1 )
and CATEGORY_ID in (select distinct(sc.CATEGORY_ID) from categorys sc inner join categorys mc on sc.parent_id=mc.category_id inner join categorys bc on mc.parent_id=bc.category_id and bc.category_name like '%'||#bCategoryName#||'%' and mc.is_phy=1 )
order by $orderByClause$

select pb.brand_name as brandName, p.procuct_name as productName, p.product_title as productTitle, ta_temp.col as productSkuDesc, (case p.PRODUCT_TYPE when 1 then 'OTC药品' when 2 then '医疗器械' when 3 then '处方药' else '非药品' end) as productType, p.product_no as productNo, ps.product_sku_code as productSkuCode, ps.COST_PRICE as costPrice, ps.mark_price as markPrice, ps.price as price, (case ps.status when '1' then '有效' when '0' then '无效' else '其它' end) as productSkuStatus, ps.PV_VALUE pvValue, (case p.status when '3' then '上架' when '4' then '下架' when '-2' then '违规下架' else '其它' end) as status, bca.CATEGORY_NAME as firstCategoryName, mca.CATEGORY_NAME as secondCategoryName, ca.CATEGORY_NAME as thirdCategoryName, F.CORPORATE_NAME as supplierName, (case si.supplier_type when 1 then '自营' when 2 then '入驻' when 3 then '代销' else '未知类型' end) as supplierType, p.UP_TIME as upTime, p.ARCHIVE_TIME as archiveTime, p.POSTIL as postil, ps.product_sku_id as productSkuId FROM PRODUCT_SKU PS INNER JOIN PRODUCTMAIN P ON PS.PRODUCT_ID=P.PRODUCT_ID INNER JOIN PROD_BRAND PB ON P.BRAND_ID = PB.BRAND_ID INNER JOIN CATEGORYS CA ON P.CATEGORY_ID = CA.CATEGORY_ID INNER JOIN CATEGORYS MCA ON MCA.CATEGORY_ID = CA.PARENT_ID INNER JOIN CATEGORYS BCA ON BCA.CATEGORY_ID = MCA.PARENT_ID INNER JOIN SUPPLIERS_INFO SI ON P.SHOP_CODE = TO_CHAR(SI.SUPPLIER_ID)
and SI.SUPPLIER_TYPE=2
INNER JOIN COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_INFO F ON F.N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID=SI.MERCHANT_ID inner join (select temp.product_sku_id, wm_concat(temp.CATEGORY_ATTR_VALUE) col from (SELECT PS1.PRODUCT_SKU_ID,DECODE(PSA.NEW_ATTR,NULL,CAV.CATEGORY_ATTR_VALUE,PSA.NEW_ATTR) as CATEGORY_ATTR_VALUE from product_sku ps1 LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_SKU_ATTR PSA ON PSA.PRODUCT_SKU_ID = PS1.PRODUCT_SKU_ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_ATTR_VALUE CAV ON CAV.CATEGORY_ATTR_ID = PSA.CATEGORY_ATTR_ID AND PSA.CATEGORY_ATTR_VALUE_ID=CAV.CATEGORY_ATTR_VALUE_ID) temp GROUP BY TEMP.PRODUCT_SKU_ID) TA_TEMP ON PS.PRODUCT_SKU_ID=TA_TEMP.PRODUCT_SKU_ID where 1=1
and mca.CATEGORY_ID = #mCategoryId#
AND F.CORPORATE_NAME like '%'||#supplierNameForSearch#||'%'
and bca.CATEGORY_ID = #bCategoryId#
and pb.BRAND_NAME like '%'||#searchBrandName#||'%'
and ca.CATEGORY_NAME like '%'||#searchCategoryName#||'%' and ca.IS_PHY = 1
and mca.category_name like '%'||#mCategoryName#||'%' and mca.is_phy=1
and bca.category_name like '%'||#bCategoryName#||'%' and bca.is_phy=1
and p.product_title like '%'||#productTitle#||'%'
and p.KEYWORD like '%'||#keyWord#||'%'
and p.PRODUCT_NO like '%'||#productNo#||'%'
and p.CATEGORY_ID = #categoryId#
and p.status = #status#
and p.product_type = #productType#
and p.BRAND_ID = #brandId#
ORDER BY P.PRODUCT_ID DESC

select PRODUCT_ID, CATEGORY_ID, PROCUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC, PACK_LISTING, PRODUCT_TITLE,PRODUCT_SUBTITLE,POSTIL, PRODUCT_TYPE, KEYWORD, STATUS, CREATE_USER,CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_TIME, PRODUCTHOT, ARCHIVE_TIME,CHECK_USER,CHECK_USER_NAME, CHECK_TIME, MODIF_TIME, SHOP_CODE, MODIF_USER, UP_TIME, MARKET_PRICE, COST_PRICE, PRODUCT_NO, BRAND_ID, BRAND_NAME,APPROVAL_TYPE,APPROVAL_NO,CATEGORY_NAME,DRUG_CATE_ID,DRUG_CATE_CODE,ERP_PRODUCT_CODE from PRODUCTMAIN where 1=1
and CATEGORY_ID in (select CATEGORY_ID from CATEGORYS where PARENT_ID = #mCategoryId# )
and CATEGORY_ID in (select sc.CATEGORY_ID from categorys sc inner join categorys mc on sc.parent_id=mc.category_id inner join categorys bc on mc.parent_id=bc.category_id where bc.category_id = #bCategoryId# )
and BRAND_ID in (select BRAND_ID from PROD_BRAND where BRAND_NAME like '%'||#searchBrandName#||'%' )
and CATEGORY_ID in (select CATEGORY_ID from CATEGORYS where CATEGORY_NAME like '%'||#searchCategoryName#||'%' and IS_PHY = 1 )
and CATEGORY_ID in (select distinct(sc.CATEGORY_ID) from categorys sc inner join categorys mc on sc.parent_id=mc.category_id and mc.category_name like '%'||#mCategoryName#||'%' and mc.is_phy=1 )
and CATEGORY_ID in (select distinct(sc.CATEGORY_ID) from categorys sc inner join categorys mc on sc.parent_id=mc.category_id inner join categorys bc on mc.parent_id=bc.category_id and bc.category_name like '%'||#bCategoryName#||'%' and mc.is_phy=1 )
order by $orderByClause$

select * from view_productsku_sections where 1=1
order by $orderByClause$

select count(PRODUCT_ID) from PRODUCTMAIN
order by $orderByClause$

select PRODUCT_ID, CATEGORY_ID, PROCUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC,INTRODUCE ,PACK_LISTING, PRODUCT_TITLE,PRODUCT_SUBTITLE, PRODUCT_TYPE, KEYWORD, STATUS, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, PRODUCTHOT, ARCHIVE_TIME, CHECK_TIME, MODIF_TIME, POSTIL, SHOP_CODE, MODIF_USER, UP_TIME, MARKET_PRICE, COST_PRICE, PRODUCT_NO ,CREATE_USER_NAME , CHECK_USER,CHECK_USER_NAME, BRAND_ID, BRAND_NAME,APPROVAL_TYPE,APPROVAL_NO,CATEGORY_NAME,DRUG_CATE_ID,DRUG_CATE_CODE,ERP_PRODUCT_CODE from PRODUCTMAIN where PRODUCT_ID = #id:DECIMAL#

select PRODUCT_ID, CATEGORY_ID, PROCUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC,INTRODUCE ,PACK_LISTING, PRODUCT_TITLE,PRODUCT_SUBTITLE, PRODUCT_TYPE, KEYWORD, STATUS, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, PRODUCTHOT, ARCHIVE_TIME, CHECK_TIME, MODIF_TIME, POSTIL, SHOP_CODE, MODIF_USER, UP_TIME, MARKET_PRICE, COST_PRICE, PRODUCT_NO ,CREATE_USER_NAME , CHECK_USER,CHECK_USER_NAME, BRAND_ID, BRAND_NAME,APPROVAL_TYPE,APPROVAL_NO,CATEGORY_NAME,DRUG_CATE_ID,DRUG_CATE_CODE,ERP_PRODUCT_CODE ,INTRODUCE_LAZY from PRODUCTMAIN where PRODUCT_ID = #id:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE PRODUCTMAIN
CATEGORY_ID = #record.categoryId:DECIMAL#
PRODUCT_TYPE = #record.productType:DECIMAL#
PRODUCT_SUBTITLE = #record.productSubtitle:VARCHAR#
POSTIL = #record.postil:VARCHAR#
PROCUCT_NAME = #record.name:VARCHAR#
PRODUCT_DESC = #record.productDesc:VARCHAR#
PACK_LISTING = #record.packListing:VARCHAR#
PRODUCT_TITLE = #record.productTitle:VARCHAR#
KEYWORD = #record.keyword:VARCHAR#
STATUS = #record.status:VARCHAR#
PRODUCTHOT = #record.productHot:DECIMAL#
ARCHIVE_TIME = #record.archiveTime:Date#
CHECK_TIME = #record.checkTime:Date#
MODIF_TIME = #record.modifTime:Date#
SHOP_CODE = #record.shopCode:VARCHAR#
MODIF_USER = #record.modifUser:INTEGER#
UP_TIME = #record.upTime:Date#
MARKET_PRICE = #record.marketPrice:DECIMAL#
COST_PRICE = #record.costPrice:DECIMAL#
PRODUCT_NO = #record.productNo:VARCHAR#
BRAND_ID = #record.brandId:DECIMAL#
BRAND_NAME = #record.brandName:VARCHAR#
APPROVAL_TYPE = #record.approvalType:VARCHAR#
APPROVAL_NO = #record.approvalNo:VARCHAR#
CATEGORY_NAME = #record.categoryName:VARCHAR#
DRUG_CATE_ID = #record.drugCateId:DECIMAL#
DRUG_CATE_CODE = #record.drugCateCode:VARCHAR#

update PRODUCTMAIN
CATEGORY_ID = #categoryId:DECIMAL#
PRODUCT_TYPE = #productType:DECIMAL#
PRODUCT_SUBTITLE = #productSubtitle:VARCHAR#
POSTIL = #postil:VARCHAR#
PROCUCT_NAME = #name:VARCHAR#
PRODUCT_DESC = #productDesc:VARCHAR#
PACK_LISTING = #packListing:VARCHAR#
PRODUCT_TITLE = #productTitle:VARCHAR#
KEYWORD = #keyword:VARCHAR#
STATUS = #status:VARCHAR#
PRODUCTHOT = #productHot:DECIMAL#
MODIF_TIME = #modifTime:Date#
SHOP_CODE = #shopCode:VARCHAR#
MODIF_USER = #modifUser:INTEGER#
MARKET_PRICE = #marketPrice:DECIMAL#
COST_PRICE = #costPrice:DECIMAL#
PRODUCT_NO = #productNo:VARCHAR#
INTRODUCE = #introduce:CLOB#
BRAND_ID = #brandId:DECIMAL#
BRAND_NAME = #brandName:VARCHAR#
DRUG_CATE_ID = #drugCateId:DECIMAL#
DRUG_CATE_CODE = #drugCateCode:VARCHAR#
APPROVAL_TYPE = #approvalType:VARCHAR#
APPROVAL_NO = #approvalNo:VARCHAR#
ERP_PRODUCT_CODE = #erpProductCode:VARCHAR#
INTRODUCE_LAZY = #introduceLazy:VARCHAR#
where PRODUCT_ID = #id:DECIMAL#
UPDATE PRODUCTMAIN SET STATUS='3', UP_TIME = sysdate WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #id# and STATUS='-2'
UPDATE PRODUCTMAIN SET STATUS='-2',ARCHIVE_TIME=sysdate,REASONS=#reasons# WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #productId# and STATUS='3'
UPDATE PRODUCTMAIN SET STATUS = #status#, UP_TIME = #upTime# WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #id# and (STATUS='2' or STATUS='4' or STATUS='5')
UPDATE PRODUCTMAIN SET STATUS = #status#, ARCHIVE_TIME = #archiveTime# WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #id# and STATUS='3'
sqlMap.delete: delete from PRODUCTMAIN where STATUS!='3' and PRODUCT_ID = #id#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PRODUCTMAIN SET STATUS =#status#, UP_TIME=#upTime#, MODIF_TIME=#modifTime#, MODIF_USER=#modifUser# WHERE PRODUCT_ID=#id# and status in ('2','4','5')
sqlMap.select: select max(t.product_no) from PRODUCTMAIN t where t.product_no like '$inputCode$____'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PRODUCTMAIN SET STATUS = '2', UP_TIME = sysdate WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #id# and STATUS='1'
sqlMap.select: select p.product_id,p.category_id,p.shop_code from productmain p where p.product_id=( select sku.product_id from product_sku sku where sku.product_sku_id=#productSkuId:DECIMAL#)
SELECT PRODUCT_ID FROM PRODUCTMAIN WHERE BRAND_ID = #brandId:DECIMAL# AND STATUS = '3'
select spi.supplier_type from productmain pm,suppliers_info spi where pm.shop_code = to_char(spi.supplier_id) and pm.product_id = #productId:DECIMAL#

select * from productmain where 1=1
shop_code = to_char(#suppliers[]#)
